participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and overwhelmed with life changes, seeking clarity and support.
participant_1.background: i'm 40 years old. i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Energetic and curious, with a passion for sports but struggles with academics.
participant_2.background: my brother is older than me. i hate math class. i ride the bus to school. i'm on the soccer team. i am 13 years old.

content.text: I like to eat, but not on the grill though. Do you hate my job ?
I am a huge fan of all types of things, but not a lot of money .
I am not sure really. What about you ?
